metadata.synopsis: Savannah (Bridgette Andersen) is the daughter of a neglectful politician who is consumed by his U.S. Senate campaign. She decides to escape, hiding in the car of two men on the run from the law. Alvie (Mark Miller) and Boots (Donovan Scott) initially try to use her to obtain a hefty reward for her return, but a bond grows among the three runaways. Their relationship is tested when the convicts, now seen as kidnappers, must choose between their freedom and their new friend.

reviews: Harmless...Plays out predictably...OK entertainment for kids.
